1001_my_first_char.json.title: My First Character / Level 1-10
1001_my_first_char.json.comment_one: For your very first character in Legends of Idleon, you would put at least 10 points into 'Sharpened Axe', which gives you a flat damage bonus
1001_my_first_char.json.notes: Welcome to the game! It will be a great journey, hope we'll see you again!

2001_alchemy.json.title: Alchemy / AFK Shaman
2001_alchemy.json.comment_three:
"Cranium Cooking" has too long cooldown to be considered effective right now.
Pick the alch talents as needed for your current goal. Most likely, you will do brew speed and sharing talent first

2002_catch_act.json.title: Catching Active / AFK (Bowman)
2002_catch_act.json.comment_one:
Max out both "Elusive efficiency"  and "Quickness boots"
*1- you can invest into "Broken time" with excess points.
2002_catch_act.json.comment_two:
Max "Sanic speed" and "Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality" to boost "Briar patch runner on tab 3
"Focused Soul" for xp gains
2002_catch_act.json.comment_three:
You have ability to invest into 3 efficiency skills overall, "Briar patch runner" and "Teleki'Net'ic" are both great sources of that.
Consider maxing out "Sunset on Hives" for more afk  gains, "Bug enthusiast" is for speeding up xp gain.
2002_catch_act.json.notes: With around 100k oak logs + ~400 agi you'll be able to catch fruitflies, but at very slow rate.

2003_fish_act.json.title: Fishing Active / AFK (Barbarian)
2003_fish_act.json.comment_one: You want to max "Idle Skilling" and "Brute Efficiency", then  "Fist of Rage"
2003_fish_act.json.comment_two:
Maxing "Absolute Unit" and "Firmly Grasp it" gives some efficiency.
"Tempestous Emotions" provide extra xp.
2003_fish_act.json.comment_three:
Max "Worming Undercover" and "Catching some ZZZ's", boost "All fish diet" if you're going for xp
*1 = Boost it to around your minigame score.
*2 = Excess points here.
2003_fish_act.json.notes: Due to prowess effect not working active, AFK fishing will always be better if you have at least 2x prowess

2004_min_act.json.title: Mining Active / AFk (Warrior)
2004_min_act.json.comment_one:
You want to max "Brute Efficiency" and "Idle Skilling", then "Fist of Rage".
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
2004_min_act.json.comment_two:
You want to max "Big Pick", then "Tempestuous Emotions", and mix the mining talents.
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
*2 You can max "Firmly Grasp It" If you've maxed mining talents already.
2004_min_act.json.comment_three:
Get "Strongest Statues" and "Back to Basics" to 100.
Excess points can go towards "Str Summore"
2004_min_act.json.notes: You can get the most of mining on around level 95. Further levels give less gains/level.

2005_smith_afk.json.title: Smithing / AFK (Archer)
2005_smith_afk.json.comment_one:
"Broken Time" is a nice way of speeding up anvil produce time. Max this.
Agility also affects smithing speed.
2005_smith_afk.json.comment_two:
"Godly Creation" gives you 29% (lvl 100).
 "Acme Anvil" gives you anvil points to spend.
"Focused Soul" will increase your xp gain from producing.
"Sanic Speed" and "Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality" will help you boosting your agility.
2005_smith_afk.json.comment_three:
"Shwifty Statues" Boosts your Anvil Statues.
"Agi Again" will help boosting your production speed a bit.
2005_smith_afk.json.notes:
Smithing is an AFK skill, it doesn't require active playing. If youre only after production speed you can mix that talent in farming or catching build.
Remember to "empty" your capacity or you will loose xp. Material bags increase capacity,

2006_wood_act.json.title: Woodcutter Active / AFK (Mage)
2006_wood_act.json.comment_one:
You want to max "Active AFKer" and "Smart Efficiency", then "Book of the Wise".
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
2006_wood_act.json.comment_two:
You want to max "Log on Logs", then mix chopping talents.
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
2006_wood_act.json.comment_three:
Get "Stupendous Statues" and "Earlier Education" to 100.
Excess points can go towards "Wis Wumbo"
2006_wood_act.json.notes: You can get the most of chopping on around level 95.

3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.title: Journeyman AFK 40
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.comment_two: Leveling active skills will help with AFK damage, even if they arent combat related
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.title: Journeyman AFK (~55)
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.comment_two: Leveling active skills will help with AFK damage, even if they arent combat related
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

3003_journeyman_act_70.json.title: Journeyman Active (~70)
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.comment_one: Best best is to compare points and see what gives you more damage
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.comment_two: Whip is your only damaging skill and it isnt that strong, so activing will be rough
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.notes: Active journeyman will be difficult to level. You want to try to get as much damage as you can while slowly getting whip to level 100.

3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.title: Journeyman AFK (~70)
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.comment_one: Journeyman has 4 talents that impact damage in tab 1. Once you get those maxed, it is up to you what you want - you can go for HP/defense for survivability, movespeed, etc
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.comment_two:
Leveling active skills will help with AFK damage, even if they arent combat related.
*1 - At this point, you can start putting some points into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you are looking for
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash.

4001_warrior.json.title: Warrior Build (~35)
4001_warrior.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as you to reach 218 accuracy (for mimics) After fixing Accuracy prioritise Sharpened axe > Gilded Sword > Meatshank
4001_warrior.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max 'Carry a Big Stick'
Not gonna lie, that's probably all the points youre gonna have at this level.
4001_warrior.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

4101_barb_act_50.json.title: Barbarian Active (50)
4101_barb_act_50.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost wis to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe
4101_barb_act_50.json.comment_two:
Put 1 point into active skills, then 41 into 'Double strike' for 50%
Maxing 'Carry a Big Stick' then putting 20 points each into 'Absolute Unit' and 'Strength in Numbers' is probably gonna take all your points at this level.
4101_barb_act_50.json.comment_three: Put 1 point in every active skill then everything into 'Back to Basics'
4101_barb_act_50.json.notes: This build prioritises farming  Sand Castles as main activity (they should give best active xp/h then)

4102_barb_afk_50.json.title: Barbarian AFK (50)
4102_barb_afk_50.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost wis to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
"Idle Brawling" to 75 for 12%
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe
4102_barb_afk_50.json.comment_two:
You want to level up active skills to about 35.
"Carry a Big Stick", "Absolute unit" and "Strength in Numbers" have less priority in afk builds.
4102_barb_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level up "Bear Strike" and "Axe hurl" to around 30, still 1 point into "Mocking shout".
*1= you can put some points into "Back to basics" if youre lacking points on tab 2.
4102_barb_afk_50.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier.
Min Damage to cap Sand Castles with these active skills: 1900

4103_barb_afk_70.json.title: Barbarian / AFK (~70)
4103_barb_afk_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Skilling" > "Book of the Wise" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
4103_barb_afk_70.json.comment_two: Go for ~50 in each active skill, then you want to max "Carry A Big Stick", then mix "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in numbers".
4103_barb_afk_70.json.comment_three: Go for ~50 in dmg active skills, then either put points into "Back to Basics" or continue buffing dmg skills.
4103_barb_afk_70.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 2700

4104_barbarian_act_70.json.title: Barbarian Active (<lvl 70)
4104_barbarian_act_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Book of the Wise" then dmg talents then "Lucky Clover" for more EXP gains.
*1 = As much as needed.
*2 = Put rest of points here.
4104_barbarian_act_70.json.comment_two: Go for 1 in each active skill, then 50 % in "Double Strike", max "Carry A Big Stick", then mix "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in numbers".
4104_barbarian_act_70.json.comment_three: Go for 1 in each active skill, then you want to max "Back to Basics",  after that max "Bear Claw" for faster clear.
4104_barbarian_act_70.json.notes: This is the end goal for around level 70, after that you want to invest into changes.

4105_barb_act_85.json.title: Barbarian Active (85)
4105_barb_act_85.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost your wis to reliably hit crystal mobs at rats.
After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4105_barb_act_85.json.comment_two:
After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
*41= After you get minimum damage high enough to 1 shot the mob your farming, move these points to %HP
4105_barb_act_85.json.comment_three:
Max "No pain no gain" and "Back to Basics", then put points into active skills.
*1 = max it around 5  "Apocalypse zow" procs
4105_barb_act_85.json.notes: At around this level you should start focusing on getting as many procs of "Apocalypse zow" as you can.

4106_barb_zow_act.json.title: Barbarian Zow Farming (85)
4106_barb_zow_act.json.comment_one: *1= Boost your wis to reliably hit every mob in the game. After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4106_barb_zow_act.json.comment_two:
After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
*41= After you get minimum damage high enough to 1 shot the mob your farming, move these points to %HP
4106_barb_zow_act.json.comment_three:
Max "Monster decimator" and "Back to Basics", then put points into active skills.
*1 = max it around 5 "Apocalypse zow" procs
*20 = max this after maxing Zow
4106_barb_zow_act.json.notes: Whole point of this build is to get as many Zow stacks as fast you can.

4107_barb_act_100.json.title: Barbarian Active (100)
4107_barb_act_100.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost your wis to reliably hit crystal at nuttos/snelbies.
After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4107_barb_act_100.json.comment_two: After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4107_barb_act_100.json.comment_three: Max "Apocalypse Zow", "Back to Basics" and "No Pain No Gain" then put points into other active skills.
4107_barb_act_100.json.notes: At this level you should be able to tell which talent will benefit you the most, as some might be situational.

4201_squire_afk_50.json.title: Squire AFK (50)
4201_squire_afk_50.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost wis to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
"Idle Brawling" to 75 for 12%.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe
4201_squire_afk_50.json.comment_two: You want to level up the three active skills to 35 and use "Carry a Big Stick" to get your sheet damage up
4201_squire_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level the 4 active skills evenly on this tab
IMPORTANT: Do not activate balanced spirit, just put it on your bar and never ever click it
4201_squire_afk_50.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier.
Min Damage to cap Sand Castles with these active skills: 1400

4202_sqr_afk_70.json.title: Squire AFK (~lvl 70)
4202_sqr_afk_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Skilling" > "Book of the Wise" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
4202_sqr_afk_70.json.comment_two: Go for ~50 in each active skill, then you want to max "Carry A Big Stick", then mix "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in numbers".
4202_sqr_afk_70.json.comment_three:
Level the 4 active skills evenly on this tab
IMPORTANT: Do not activate balanced spirit, just put it on your bar and never ever click it
4202_sqr_afk_70.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 1700

4203_act_70.json.title: Squire Active (~lvl 70)
4203_act_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Book of the Wise" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in. Your goal should be 0 points, achieved from alchemy. Aim for 1.5x accuracy for precision power on tab 3.
4203_act_70.json.comment_two:
Go for 1 in each active skill, then you want to max "Carry A Big Stick", then mix "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in numbers".
As you gain more levels, considering putting points in Whirl.
4203_act_70.json.comment_three: Shockwave is all you need here for active clearing. Depending on map "Daggerang" can be good or bad so 1+ point as you see fit. If you have 1.5 times req accuracy, max precision power. Leaving you to get 100 points into Back to Basics to help tab 2
4203_act_70.json.notes: Squire can be a great active class due to weapon hitting multiple targets along with great AOE active skills.

5001_arch_35.json.title: Archer Build (~35)
5001_arch_35.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as you to reach 218accuracy (for mimics)
You can mix "Sharpened sword" with "Gilded sword" in regular archer build.
5001_arch_35.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "High polymer limbs"
Not gonna lie, that's probably all the points youre gonna have at this level.
5001_arch_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

5101_bow_act_50.json.title: Bowman Active (50)
5101_bow_act_50.json.comment_one:
*1= Boost str to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
At this level you can start prioritising "Gilded sword" over "Sharpened axe"
5101_bow_act_50.json.comment_two:
You want to prioritise "Strafe" > "Have Another!" > "High Polymer Limbs" > "Piercing Arrow" >"Veins of the Infernal"
*1= As much as needed for 130% with 5-15 points in "Featherweight"
5101_bow_act_50.json.comment_three: Put 1 point in each active skill then you want to prioritise "SpeeDna" up to 40 points first, then invest into "Previous Points"
5101_bow_act_50.json.notes: This build prioritises farming  Sand Castles as main activity (they should give best active xp/h then)

5102_bow_afk_50.json.title: Bowman AFK (50)
5102_bow_afk_50.json.comment_one: *1= Boost str to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
5102_bow_afk_50.json.comment_two:
*1= As much as needed for 130% with 5-15 points in "Featherweight". 130% is to get to speedna breakpoint, AFK MS cap is 200%+ at sand giants
You want to level up "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung Fu Kick" to about 40. "High polymer limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal" have less priority here.
5102_bow_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level up "Homing Arrow" and "Magic shortbow" to around 40, "Extended  rangeo" still to 1.
"SpeeDna" should be at at least level 40 to be effective.
5102_bow_afk_50.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Castles with these active skills: 2100

5103_bow_afk_70.json.title: Bowman AFK (lvl70)
5103_bow_afk_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Shooting" > "Fist of Rage" > "Featherweight" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed.
5103_bow_afk_70.json.comment_two:
Prioritise "Strafe", then "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung fu kick" up to ~50 points in each before going for "High polymer limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal"
*1= As much as needed for 130% movement speed with 5-15 points in "Featherweight".
5103_bow_afk_70.json.comment_three: You want to prioritise "SpeeDna" up to 50-60 points first, then either invest into  "Homing arrows" and "Magic shortbow" up to ~50 each, then you can consider investing into"Previous points"
5103_bow_afk_70.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 3100

5104_bow_act_70.json.title: Bowman / Active (<lvl 70)
5104_bow_act_70.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Fist of Rage" > "Featherweight" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed.
5104_bow_act_70.json.comment_two:
You want to prioritise "Strafe" > "Have Another!" > "High Polymer Limbs" > "Veins of the Infernal" > "Piercing Arrow"
*1= As much as needed for 130% with 5-15 points in "Featherweight"
5104_bow_act_70.json.comment_three:
You want to prioritise "SpeeDna" up to 50-60 points first, then invest into "Previous Points"
Excess points can go towards "Homing Arrows"
5104_bow_act_70.json.notes: This is the end goal for around level 70, after that you want to invest into changes.

5105_bow_afk_90.json.title: Bowman AFK (lvl90)
5105_bow_afk_90.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Shooting" > "Fist of Rage" > "Featherweight" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed.
5105_bow_afk_90.json.comment_two:
Prioritise "Strafe", then "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung fu kick" up to ~50 points in each before going for "High polymer limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal"
*1= As much as needed for 130% movement speed with 5-15 points in "Featherweight".
5105_bow_afk_90.json.comment_three: Max "Homing Arrows" and "Magic Shortbow", excess points can go towards maxing "SpeeDna"
5105_bow_afk_90.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 2600

5106_spear_act_70.json.title: "Spearmen" Active (~70+)
5106_spear_act_70.json.comment_one:
AGI as last thing to max
*1 = As much as needed.
Use extra points as you see fit. Crit, luck, wisdom/mana if you have mana issues
5106_spear_act_70.json.comment_two:
Veins of inferal is very strong as you get higher smithing, Just watch your damage per point if you go past ~50 or so and compare to high poly limbs
*1= extra points can go to AGI if you need damage to 1 shot, or drop rarity of not.
5106_spear_act_70.json.comment_three: Max "SpeeDna", "Extendo Rangeo" and "Homing Arrows", excess points can go towards maxing "Magic Shortbow" or "Woah, that was fast!"
5106_spear_act_70.json.notes: This build uses a spear and extendo rangeo to hit a large number of enemies with melee. This build is great for clearing coliseum as an archer, gives excelent active xp gains, and does fair vs bosses.

5201_hunt_afk_50.json.title: Hunter AFK (50)
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_one: *1= Boost str to have 405 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_two: You want to level up "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung Fu Kick" to about 40. "High polymer limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal" have less priority here.
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level the 4 active skills evenly on this tab
*20= Use this to bring your damage up as needed to hit damage cap
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Castles with these active skills: 3000

5202_hun_act_70.json.title: Hunter Active (~70)
5202_hun_act_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Strength as needed for accuracy
*2 = Extra points here after Gilded and Axe are maxed and you hit accuracy needs
5202_hun_act_70.json.comment_two: Limbs and Veins for damage. Piercing arrow for clear
5202_hun_act_70.json.comment_three: After you max damage from items, start working on uwu rawrrr and traps. Goal is to get both to 100.
5202_hun_act_70.json.notes: With this build, you will likely have your best XP per hour at poops/rats. If you have enough damage, a spear might be better over a bow.

5203_hun_afk_90.json.title: Hunter AFK (~90)
5203_hun_afk_90.json.comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Shooting" > "Fist of Rage" > "Featherweight" then dmg talents.
"Broken Time" is nice talent point sink when you dont need accuracy/dmg.
*1 =Once you are damage capped, max this at sand giants to 200% MS
5203_hun_afk_90.json.comment_two:
Prioritise  Strafe, then max "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung Fu Kick" , "Polymer Limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal" are good dmg boost.
*1= Once you are damage capped with the above, push strafe and featherweight as high as you can as sand giants speed cap is 200%+ MS
5203_hun_afk_90.json.comment_three:
Level the 4 active skills evenly on this tab
*20= Use this to bring your damage up as needed to hit damage cap
5203_hun_afk_90.json.notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monster’s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 3100

5204_hunter_act_snelbie_80.json.title: Hunter Active Snelbie (80+)
5204_hunter_act_snelbie_80.json.comment_one:
*50= IMPORTANT: You need ~540 mana to sustain, so level mana until you hit that
*1 = Enough for 1.8k+ accuracy
Level agility last
5204_hunter_act_snelbie_80.json.comment_two: Movement speed doesn't matter at snelbies, so max piercing arrow then your 2 big damage talents
5204_hunter_act_snelbie_80.json.comment_three:
Uwu Rawrr is the key for this build. If you have the desert respawn merit maxed, 60 in uwu is all you need.
Don't go over 90 on traps
*20 = Fill in damage with leftover points
5204_hunter_act_snelbie_80.json.notes:
This build relies on using uwu rawrrr to rapidly respawn snelbies for good experience. 15k max damage should be enough.
You can use t3/t4 bow to start, eventually with enough damage switch to a spear.

6001_mage_35.json.title: Mage Build (~35)
6001_mage_35.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as you to reach 218accuracy (for mimics)
6001_mage_35.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming"
Not gonna lie, that's probably all the points youre gonna have at this level.
6001_mage_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

6101_sham_camarok_kill_90.json.title: Shaman C.Amarok Killer (90+)
6101_sham_camarok_kill_90.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as needed to hit ~2.6k accuracy AFTER accuracy cards equipped
*100 = max this last
6101_sham_camarok_kill_90.json.comment_two:
*100 talent to max before *99 to max
*25 = Depends on chopping high score
6101_sham_camarok_kill_90.json.comment_three: ﻿﻿﻿Virile Vials are a huge damage boost, and crazy concotions will be your main source of burst damage
6101_sham_camarok_kill_90.json.notes:
FMJ Bullet, Midnight Cookie, Golden Kebabs, and Golden Nomwich if you are not afraid to step away and swap to healing food as needed.
A single properly used crazy concoctions can "one shot" him, while he is vulnerable from your auto attack. Perfect vial usage is 350 ms (.35 seconds) then release for damage vial, if fast enough you can throw 4 vials making this fight very easy.
